entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
